page.title: 16CUSTOMS-GOTHAM TALES
page.content: Gotham is well known for its tales of the wise men.One of its most famous tales is about the cuckoo and how the 'wise men' tried to capture it. Spring was a happy time for the people of Gotham and every year they waited for the cold winter to finish and those lovely sunny days of spring to come. Now the people of Gotham often had meetings to discuss such things,as why the sky was blue and how long a piece of string was.As spring came when the cuckoo called,they decided to search for the cuckoo and bring it back to Gotham because they wanted spring to stay all the year round. The wise men built a fence around the outside of the bush where the cuckoo was, but of course the cuckoo escaped,and so the people of Gotham have all the seasons just like you.
